p: The content of essential oil was obtained from 0.8 to 1ml per 100gr of dried leaves and the density of the essential oil was calculated as d EO= 0.94g mL âˆ’1. Oregano essential oil was found to contain 158 compounds using GC-MS. The most common compounds are shown in Table 1 and Fig. 2. In addition, chemical analysis of essential oil of O. vulgare is shown in Fig. 3.
